description: good love me and the boys play it all day

I've played this game for 65 hours and i can firmly say that i wasnt that interested in racing games, but this is just. Outstanding. The game is perfectly balanced and there are TONS of characters that the community has made, basically this is a mod of Sonic Robo Blast 2, which is a mod of Doom Legacy. If you have the time to play it, PLAY IT.
it just feels smooth to play with a conntroller.
This game has outstanding courses and music and also boasts an online lobby finder and cross-platform multiplayer.

this is just legendary, if you're reading this, PLEASE DOWNLOAD THIS RIGHT NOW, you will be engulfed in euphoria by the time you're done play (unless you suck at kart games and you dislike losing, but even then the charm from the game will probably be so overwhelming you wont even care if you lose or not)
summary: the absolute most fun, most vivid and greatest kart game ever created

description: It's a really fun game to play online.
I was reminded of this game from "kart 9" that just came out from Youtuber "coraldev" this is so amazing! I'm glad you can get it on flathub because I don't think the srb2k repo works on hirsute

This game is pretty cool, looks great. But I break it on my first race.
It was a simple case of "What's that"... oh, it's a patch of break the game!

From a complete fan-made "sequel" to a fan-made kart spin-off of a fan-made game, I'm getting confused just writing this.

As insane as that is, that's exactly what has happened and it's amazing. This is like playing Mario Kart for the Snes but on steroids, and all your favorite characters are here and they look great (though much of that is through add-ons).

This is a very solid karting game, with so much content you wouldn't believe. There's add-ons for just about every character, there's so many tracks based on different franchises and the quality is very high on many of these additions.

The online is active at times and you can often find servers with players, though the skill disparity is high and you'll probably find yourself outmatched by the people that usually populate the servers.

This another one I also highly recommend.
summary: Sonic fans are insane and I love it

description: game is great but i cant install or uninstall mods because of were it installs the game
I previously played STK, and it doesn't look as good. But this game is pixelated and it makes the graphic look really good, it has own climate, and also the soundtrack is really really good.
summary: One of the best games i have ever played

description: because i love how sonic races
I don't like all the songs but yeah, this game is better than any official sonic 3d racing game that came out after Sonic R.
This port is amazing, for those who want to play this game on linux, it just works perfect! Even the Online works as it is suposed to be!
